abstract: Japanese industrial conglomerates, with the cooperation of the government in Tokyo, are renewing their pursuit of multi-billion-dollar nuclear projects, particularly in smaller countries, even as Japan plans to phase out nuclear power as too risky for domestic use.
snippet: Japanese industrial conglomerates, with the cooperation of the government in Tokyo, are renewing their pursuit of multibillion-dollar nuclear projects, particularly in smaller countries.
lead_paragraph: Japanese industrial conglomerates, with the cooperation of the government in Tokyo, are renewing their pursuit of multibillion-dollar nuclear projects, particularly in smaller countries.

headline.main: Japan Courts the Money in Reactors
headline.print_headline: Japan Courts The Money In Reactors
headline.seo: Japan Courts the Money in Nuclear Reactors, Selling Them Abroad
